senses.sense_definition: An arboretum or section of a garden dedicated to the cultivation of conifers.

examples.text: The estate features a large <w>pinetum</w> containing rare species of fir and spruce.
We decided to visit the <w>pinetum</w> to study the different types of pine needles.

senses.sense_definition: A scientific treatise or book describing conifer trees.

examples.text: The researcher consulted an old <w>pinetum</w> to identify the tree from the illustration.
He owns a first edition <w>pinetum</w> that details the forests of the region.
